name: About:NewTab black (firefox, custom color possibl)
description:
Does what it says. Hides the gear icon/button too (set it to "show blank page" there).
Hit "Advanced Style Settings" to choose your own color.
you might also want this style for about:blank
additional_info:
/*****************************************
REMOVED DUE TO STYLISH PRIVACY INVASION 
more info here: https://www.theregister.co.uk/2018/07/05/browsers_pull_stylish_but_invasive_browser_extension/

My styles will probably soon be available here: https://openusercss.org/profile/5b3e81947d90940b00ad06a4
*****************************************/
